metadata.comments: This automation will extend the current expiration date of ALL alert suppression rules that are about to expire
metadata.author: Bojan Magusic, Liana Tomescu, Prasad Patil

metadata.description: Enter the sender's email address. Make sure to use an account which can authorize the API connection after deploying this automation artifact.
Enter the recipient's email address. Make sure to use an account which can authorize the API connection after deploying this automation artifact.
How many days ahead should the Logic App look for expiration dates

metadata.displayName: Enter days to extend expiration date
metadata.description: By how many days should current expiration dates get extended

inputs.name: emailBody
inputs.value:
Azure Security Center

Alert Suppression Rules Updated!

The expiration date of Alert Suppression Rule(s) listed below, has been extended by @{variables('extendExpirationTimeBy')} day(s).
 

Alert Suppression Rules Details:

Alert name

@{variables('updateASRs')}
 
 

Action items

For more information visit the Alert Suppression Rules blade in Security Center.

Message.Subject: Alert Suppression Rules Are Set to Expire Within @{variables('timeUntilExpiration')} Day(s)!

inputs.name: emailBody
inputs.value:
Azure Security Center

Alert Suppression Rules Set to Expire!

The Alert Suppression Rule(s) listed below are set to expire in @{variables('timeUntilExpiration')} day(s) .
 

Alert Suppression Rules Details:

Alert name

@{variables('updateASRs')}
 
 

Action items

  1. Selecting Extend All will extend the expiration date of ALL of the above rules by @{variables('extendExpirationTimeBy')} day(s).

  2. Once the expiration date of all Alert Suppression Rules have been extended, you will recive a confirmation email.

  3. For more information visit the Alert Suppression Rules blade in Security Center.
